tool_description: Extremely Comprehensive API to search and list apps/games top charts on the Google Play Apps Store, including extensive app details and reviews in real-time.
title: Store Apps

api_list.name: Top Paid Games
api_list.description: Top paid games chart. Supports getting the chart for specific Google Play categories.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit the number of results.

**Allowed values:** `1-200`
**Default:** `50`

Note: requests with a limit value between 101-200 will be charged double (2 requests).

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Get the chart in a specific Google Play category (e.g. *GAME_RACING*).

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
The country code of country/region to use, specified as a 2-letter country code - see [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default**: `us`.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.

api_list.name: Top Free Apps
api_list.description: Top free apps chart. Supports getting the chart for specific Google Play categories.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit the number of results.

**Allowed values:** `1-200`
**Default:** `50`

Note: requests with a limit value between 101-200 will be charged double (2 requests).

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Get the chart in a specific Google Play category (e.g. *SOCIAL*).

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
The country code of country/region to use, specified as a 2-letter country code - see [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default**: `us`.

api_list.name: Top Paid Apps
api_list.description: Top paid apps chart. Supports getting the chart for specific Google Play categories.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit the number of results.

**Allowed values:** `1-200`
**Default:** `50`

Note: requests with a limit value between 101-200 will be charged double (2 requests).

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Get the chart in a specific Google Play category (e.g. *SOCIAL*).

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
The country code of country/region to use, specified as a 2-letter country code - see [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default**: `us`.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.

api_list.name: App Reviews

required_parameters.name: app_id
required_parameters.description: App Id of the app for which to get reviews.

optional_parameters.name: device
optional_parameters.description:
Only return reviews made on a specific device type.
Allowed values: `PHONE`, `TABLET`, `CHROMEBOOK`.
Default: `PHONE`.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
The country code of country/region to use, specified as a 2-letter country code - see [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default**: `us`.

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description:
How to sort the reviews in the results.
Allowed values: `MOST_RELEVANT`, `NEWEST`, `RATING`.
Default: `MOST_RELEVANT`.

optional_parameters.name: rating
optional_parameters.description:
Only return reviews with a certain star rating.
Allowed values: `ANY`, `ONE_STAR`, `TWO_STARS`, `THREE_STARS`, `FOUR_STARS`, `FIVE_STARS`.
Default: `ANY`.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of reviews in the results.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: Specify a cursor from the previous request to get the next set of results.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.

api_list.name: App Categories
api_list.description: Get the full list of Google Play app categories. The returned categories can be used with the Charts endpoints (as the category parameter).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://store-apps.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "store-apps.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

optional_parameters.name: app_id
optional_parameters.description: App Id. Batching of up to 100 App Ids is supported by separating multiple ids by comma (e.g. com.snapchat.android,com.microsoft.teams).
